Class DefaultAuthenticator

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultAuthenticator

        public DefaultAuthenticator(AuthorizationType authorizationType,
                            String apiKeyId,
                            String secretApiKey)
        Parameters:
        authorizationType - Based on this value both the Ingenico ePayments platform and the merchant know which security implementation is used. A version number is used for backward compatibility in the future.
        apiKeyId - An identifier for the secret API key. The apiKeyId can be retrieved from the Configuration Center. This identifier is visible in the HTTP request and is also used to identify the correct account.
        secretApiKey - A shared secret. The shared secret can be retrieved from the Configuration Center. An apiKeyId and secretApiKey always go hand-in-hand, the difference is that secretApiKey is never visible in the HTTP request. This secret is used as input for the HMAC algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • createSimpleAuthenticationSignature

        public String createSimpleAuthenticationSignature(String httpMethod,
                                                  URI resourceUri,
                                                  List<RequestHeader> httpHeaders)
        Description copied from interface: Authenticator
        Creates a signature for the simple security model.
        Specified by:
        createSimpleAuthenticationSignature in interface Authenticator
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - The HTTP method.
        resourceUri - The URI of the resource.
        httpHeaders - A list of RequestHeaders. This list may not be modified and may not contain headers with the same name.
